title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make permanent the individual tax rates in effect for taxable years 2018 through 2025.
content: This bill amends the Internal Revenue Code to make permanent provisions included in P. L. 115-97 that: (1) reduced the individual tax rates, and (2) modified the taxation of the unearned income of children. The existing individual tax rates are currently scheduled to expire and revert to higher rates at the end of 2025.
